description.zh-CN: 线条轮廓风格，透过线条定义形状强谾最小化和清晰视觉级。创造简洁线条艺术风格和视觉纯净感。设计风格通过线条定义形状，强调极简和清晰视觉。创造极简线条艺术和视觉清晰。
description.en-US: Design style defining shapes through lines, emphasizing minimalism and clear visual hierarchy Creates sophisticated interfaces through outline-based compositions, linear strokes, and geometric line work for elegant, refined design solutions and professional applications Creates refined, elegant interfaces through line-based design Perfect for professional applications, corporate design, and minimalist aesthetics This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. minimalist line art and visual clarity. Excellence in design.
